attributes.action: Stop having to provide covid cards or tests at nightclubs
attributes.additional_details: This is having a massive impact on the nightclub business and breaching human rights
attributes.background: Stop customers having to provide covid vaccination cards or tests for entry to nightclubs

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
